item.title: TV Shows
item.description: More than 50 TV shows are on my list and I have watched all of them. There are alot of shows in this list where all would agree be great and enticing. There is no specific genre of my interest and I do not mind re-watching these TV shows again. 0 to 9 1983 24 A A bit of Fry and Laurie After life Altered Carbon Archer Asian Provocateur Alias B Band of Brothers Barry Big Train Black Mirror Blue Planet I,II BodyGuard BroadChurch Brooklynn Nine Nine Boston Legal C Chance Chernobyl Collateral Condor Cosmos A space time odyssey Community D Dynasties Doctor Who Derry Girls E Episodes F Family Guy Fawlty Towers Fleabag Friends Frasier G Gadget Man Game of Thrones Good Omens Goodness Gracious Me Gangs of London H House House of Cards US House of Cards UK How I Met Your Mother Harley Quinn Hunters I Informer Inside Edge J Jeeves and Wooster Jessica Jones Johnny Bravo K Key and Peele Killing Eve Koombiyo Keeping Up Appearances L Line of Duty Love, Death and Robots Luther Lucifer Last week tonight with John Oliver M Manhunt Master of None Monty Python The Flying Circus Money Heist Mindhunter Mind Your Language Mr.

item.title: Books I have read
item.description: I started reading books from month of April, 2018. Which is very useful for my life as a believer of self-learning. I hope to share these books with you so that it will be useful. There is no meaning in numbers except that they are just for ordering from 1 to further in no hierarchy. Genre specificity is not my thing therefore these books are not divided into groups.

item.title: Movies
item.description: Watching movies for the last six years(from 2012) with much interest in plot, story line and characters. I have watched more than 300 movies but the below mentioned are in my mind. They are from different decades as well, therefore do not hesitate to watch. If you prefer go through the IMDB link so that the ratings and summary will give you more information. 0 to 9 12 Angry Men 13 Hours The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi 2012 A A Private War American Gangster Aquaman Arrival Asterix and Obelix Mansion of Gods Asterix and Obelix The Secret of The Magic Potion Avengers Trilogy Argo Armageddon B Bad Boys Dualogy Batman Trilogy Between Two Ferns The Movie Black Hawk Down Black Panther BlacKkKlansman Bohemian Rhaspody Bridge of Spies Batman V Superman Dawn of Justice Bruce Almighty Broken City C Captain America Trilogy Captain Marvel Casablanca Captive State Casino Chaos Charlie Brown Charlie Chaplin Modern Times Charlie Wilsons War Constantine Cast Away D Deadpool Dualogy Deja Vu Doctor Strange Dan Brown Trilogy Die Hard Quadropolgy Despicable Me Collection Dr.
